sideBar.title: You are almost done!
sideBar.description: Your information has been reviewed with the last step is for you to sign the agreement to begin with {{companyName}}

isSigned.label: By signing, you certify that you, {{firstName}} {{lastName}}, agree to this legally binding document and acknowledge the information within is accurate to the best of your knowledge

inReview.label: Thank you!
inReview.description: Thank you for completing your last step! You are now ready to begin your employment with {{companyName}}
